body: Ah, the manga from that 2 episode ova hentai

If you haven't seen the original hentai videos of these two, here's a summary of it while you're waiting for the translation to come out: This girl (the sister) secretly enjoys her brother fucking her, so she basically roofies herself with sleeping medicine to persuade her brother to fuck her while she's sleeping. Although "roofies" isn't really accurate, as she remembers what happens clearly, and considering you can see her faking to be asleep throughout most of this, I think she's not actually taking said medicine.
